name: Asteroids Asthetica
description:
Asteroids played on a donut. Use WAD to move and SPACE to shoot. Avoid getting hit, and destroy as many Asteroids as possible to get a high score!

Created for the Longgame Tech Innovation Jam 12 (Torus). The game map is a torus (donut), so I used this opportunity to apply my Calculus III skills to create a torus-coordinate system and work with kinematics and transformations on a nonlinear surface.
